sentences.sContent: The desk was left by the previous tenant.
sentences.sCn: 书桌是上一个房客留下来的。

synos.tran: [租赁]承租人；房客；佃户；居住者

remMethod.val: ten+ant(蚂蚁)→十只蚂蚁来住店， 再小也是房客→房客

words.tran: 承租人；佃农；租出的财产；租赁

trans.tranCn: 承租人； 房客； 佃户
trans.tranOther: someone who lives in a house, room etc and pays rent to the person who owns it
